substep.description: In a skillet/pan, heat 2 tablespoons of the oil over medium-high heat

Add frozen hash brown potatoes in an even layer; press down lightly. Cook potatoes 7 minutes without moving. Drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon oil; turn. Cook 6 to 8 minutes longer or until browned on both sides and hot throughout. Transfer to a medium bowl; cover with foil to keep warm. Wipe out the skillet.
In a large bowl, beat eggs, salt and pepper until well blended.
In same skillet over medium-high heat, cook sausage 2 to 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until browned. Stir in egg mixture; cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until scrambled.
To assemble burritos, a spoon line of hash browns down the center of each tortilla. Top with cheese and egg mixture.
Roll up each tortilla tightly to secure filling. Serve immediately, or freeze.
